glossentry.glossdef: The Feedback Platform Administrator (or Platform Admin) is the person who is responsible for deploying and configuring the server and managing the Feedback account for the organization. The Platform Admin has access to an button on the right side of the top ribbon. Clicking this button opens the Admin Area where the Platform Admin has access to the Sites page that displays all the existing site configurations for the organization and the License page that shows information about the current subscription plan for the organization.
